name: MouseEvent.movementX
description: The movementX read-only property of the MouseEvent interface provides the difference in the X coordinate of the mouse pointer between the given event and the previous mousemove event. In other words, the value of the property is computed like this: currentEvent.movementX = currentEvent.screenX - previousEvent.screenX.

refs.name: Pointer Lock
refs.description: The definition of 'MouseEvent.movementX' in the 'Pointer Lock' specification.
